tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE advertising_campaign_performance (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_impressions INT,
    total_clicks INT
);

CREATE TABLE AdvertisingCampaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES AdvertisingCampaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_id INT NOT NULL,
    impressions INT NOT NULL,
    clicks INT NOT NULL,
    conversions INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT,
    ad_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    cost_per_click DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    impressions INT NOT NULL,
    clicks INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  advertising_channel VARCHAR(50),
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_groups (
  ad_group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  ad_group_name VARCHAR(255),
  targeting_criteria VARCHAR(255),
  bid_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_group_id INT,
  ad_title VARCHAR(255),
  ad_description TEXT,
  ad_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE impressions (
  impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_id INT,
  impression_datetime DATETIME,
  user_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);
